item.title: Jentery Sayers on "How do we introduce undergraduates to the digital humanities?"
item.dc:creator: Jentery Sayers
item.description: Example courses? Syllabi? Sites? Projects? Lessons? Prompts?

item.title: hopegreenberg on "Can you do TEI with students, for close reading?"
item.dc:creator: hopegreenberg
item.description: Does anyone have specific examples of assignments that use TEI encoding to do a close reading of a text? The assignment, the results or general comments about how that could be structured, or if it did work with students, would be appreciated.
